name: io.bytes.per.checksum

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
relevant log: 2-1-ERROR Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Error.  Shutting down now...java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
explanation: The value of dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated is set to 0, which means any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown. This could be a potential cause of the system shutdown.
